crypto.name: one hint
crypto.desc:
hihitherethere

Hardening the Vigenere cipher has never felt so easy. Just use it more than once.
Note: the flag matches this regex: ^LITCTF\{[a-z]+(?:_[a-z]+)*\}$

crypto.name: rng5050
crypto.desc:
w0152

Generational rng right here

If you see a !, replace it with a 1. If you see a [, replace it with a _. Also, the flag should have one lowercase f. If you see two, replace the first with an F.

misc.name: Languages1
misc.desc:
Stephanie

My friend sent me a message! What does it say?

Flag format: LITCTF{…}
For this challenge, all letters are uppercase
Note: look very, very carefully

Hint1: ASL
Hint2: the flag can have numbers
Hint3: 0 does not appear in the flag

misc.name: geoguessr1
misc.desc:
Stephanie

He looks familiar…
Where is this?

Flag format: Use three decimal points of precision and round. The last digit of the first coordinate is ODD, and the last digit of the second coordinate is EVEN.
Example: LITCTF{80.439,-23.498} (no spaces)
